SEARCH
Module ex6
Package ex6

Class Topic

java.lang.Object
ex6.Topic
public class Topic extends Object
The Topic class represents a communication topic in a publish-subscribe system. It manages the subscribers and publishers associated with the topic and handles message publishing.
